api_url.title: API URL
api_url.description: The API URL for fetching data from Bitbucket

username.title: Bitbucket Username
username.description: Bitbucket username. Either username/password or Access Token must be provided.

token.title: Bitbucket Access Token
token.description: Personal Access Token for Bitbucket API authentication. See https://confluence.atlassian.com/bitbucketserver/personal-access-tokens-939515499.html for information on how to generate this token.

workspaces.title: Workspaces
workspaces.description: List of Workspaces from which to fetch data. If none passed, all visible workspaces for the authenticated user will be used.

excluded_workspaces.title: Excluded Workspaces
excluded_workspaces.description: List of Workspaces from which data won't be fetched. By default, no workspaces are excluded. If workspaces list is specified, this list will be ignored.

repositories.title: Repositories
repositories.description: List of Bitbucket repositories in the format 'workspace/repo-slug'. If none are provided, data from all repositories for the specified workspaces will be pulled.

excluded_repositories.title: Excluded Repositories
excluded_repositories.description: List of Repositories from which data won't be fetched. By default, no repositories are excluded. If repositories list is specified, this list will be ignored.

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: Only fetch data updated after cutoff

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: Page size to use when requesting records from Bitbucket API

backfill.title: Backfill
backfill.description: Backfill data from the start date to the end date.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which to start syncing data.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The date at which to stop syncing data.

bucket_id.title: Bucket Number
bucket_id.description: Bucket number for this source to determine which portion of workspaces and repositories to pull. Use it when distributing the load between multiple sources.

bucket_total.title: Total Number of Buckets
bucket_total.description: Total number of buckets to distribute workspaces and repositories across. Use it when distributing the load between multiple sources
